channel.title: [Second Revision] Clock Drift Correction Proposal
channel.description:
With guest console [support](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Command_Line_Interface_.28CLI.29) available [this ticket](https://phabricator.whonix.org/T774) can be simplified in a major way without adding attack surface or complexity.
The scripts for triggering iptables/sdwdate actions on host suspend/resume would reside on Whonix host in the respective [systemd directories](https://www.addictivetips.com/ubuntu-linux-tips/run-scripts-and-commands-on-suspend-and-resume-on-linux/).
